content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
I'm happy to announce a new contribution, by Michikazu Hirata: the Disintegration Theorem.

I am omitting the abstract because of its heavy latex content, however he formalizes mixture and disintegraion of measures, taken from the book Random Measures, Point Processes, and Stochastic Geometry by Baccelli et.al. (Chapter 14.D).

Youâ€™ll find it online at https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Disintegration.html

Larry
